content: the phoenix beanie knitting pattern by katey stolhammer notes details abbreviations k knit method knitting p purl k2tog knit next 2 stitches together skill level intermediate st s stitch es co cast on needles circular knitting needles bl backwards loop cast-on 9mm / us 13 16 increase *see picture tutorial 10mm/ us 15 16 on page 5* double pointed needles sl1wyib slip 1 stitch purlwise with yarn 10mm / us 15 in back c2b place next stitch on left needle other cable needle onto cable needle and hold to stitch marker back of work knit next stitch yarn needle from left needle knit stitch off pom pom optional of cable needle * to* repeat whatever falls between yarn malabrigo rasta the two *…* approximately 68 yds in inch gauge 2 x 2 = 4 sts x 6 row 10mm/us 15 in stockinette st page 2 pattern note this hat is worked in the round from the bottom up finished hat measurements are 9 tall x 8 wide 1 brim with smaller needle co 40 sts join place marker at beginning of round and begin to work circularly rounds 1-7 *k1 p1* repeat around 2 body switch to 10mm/ us 15 needles tip when doing the bl increase in round 9 don t round 8 knit all sts around pull it too tight otherwise the next row might be harder for round 9 *k2 bl* repeat around 60 sts you to work round 10 *k1 k2tog* repeat around 40 sts round 11 *k1 sl1wyib* repeat around 40 sts round 12 *c2b* repeat around 40 sts repeat rounds 9-12 4 more times 5 total © 2020katey knits all rights reserved it is illegal to redistribute sell or share the pattern in part or in whole electronically or physically page 3 pattern cont d 3 decrease switch to double pointed needles if desired *please note in round 1 of the decrease you will be using the backwards loop cast on increase so that the pattern flows up into the decrease portion of the hat normally after a bl increase row you would have 60 sts but since this is a decrease row you will end with 40 sts decrease round 1 *k2tog bl* repeat around 40 sts decrease round 2 *k2tog* repeat around 20 sts decrease round 3 knit all sts around 20 sts decrease round 4 *k2tog* repeat around 10 sts 4 finishing cut yarn leaving 8in tail draw through remaining stitches fasten weave in ends feel free to sell the beanies you make from this pattern please credit me when doing so by stating that the pattern is a katey knits original do not alter this pattern in any way to claim as your own i would love to see pictures of your beautiful beanies you can tag me on instagram @katey knits and share your pic with the hashtag #thephoenixbeanie so i can see your
